author: Flo
content:
Quite striking! Like your railroad tracks going under the highway, this image has 2 faces: the left side implies distance, even tho everything is blurred. Then comes that imposing and rigid metal rod separating us from something red which cries for attention, too, but we can't get far enough around that metal divider to view it further.

This also gives me the feeling that I have when under an umbrella and it's raining and blowing so much that I can't see where I'm going, even tho I know where I am, lol.
